mapper.select: select b.id id,u.name user,b.title title,b.article article,date_format(date,'%Y-%m-%d %T') date,b.love love,b.visitor visitor,t.name type from blog_blog b,blog_type t,blog_user u where b.type_id = t.id and b.user_id = u.id order by date desc

select b.id id,u.name user,b.title title,date_format(date,'%Y-%m-%d %T') date,b.love love,b.visitor visitor,t.name type from blog_blog b,blog_type t,blog_user u where b.type_id = t.id and b.user_id = u.id order by date desc

select b.id id,u.name user,b.title title,b.article article,date_format(date,'%Y-%m-%d %T') date,b.love love,b.visitor visitor,t.name type from blog_blog b,blog_type t,blog_user u where DATE_FORMAT(date,'%Y-%m-%d') like DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and b.type_id = t.id and b.user_id = u.id

select date_format(date,'%Y-%m-%d') as datetime,count(*) as blogCount from blog_blog where UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date) between UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{calendar_30}) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{calendar}) group by date_format(date,'%Y-%m-%d')
